title: About
paragraphs: I am currently a front-end web developer, I graduated in computer science in 2019 and since then I have been exploring the world of web programming, agile methodologies and devops culture
I have experience in AB testing, creating a design system, improving metrics in web core vitals and creating automated tests.
Well, I hope I can share a little of my studies with you and learn a lot during this process, let's learn together ðŸš€
quote: Never stop learning, there is always a path you don't know.
